metadata.title: CVE-2023-24580 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Multipart Request Parser in Django 3.2before 3.2.18, 4.0 before 4.0.10, and 4.1 before 4.1.7. Passing certaininputs (e.g., an excessive number of parts) to multipart forms could resultin too many open files or memory exhaustion, and provided a potentialvector for a denial-of-service attack.

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
